NewsItem.HEADLINE: Handset 2019 Expert Insight 2 (PDF)
NewsItem.SUMMARY: Strategic insight into the use of mm-wave in handsets, hotspots or CPEs
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: This report examines the technical issues and the costs involved with mm-wave sub-arrays in mobile handsets, and evaluates the space available in the phone, the battery impact, and the cost of the mm-wave function. The incentives of mobile operators to subsidize phones, CPEs, and hotspots are investigated to predict the most likely choice for mobile operators in supporting each consumer device type.
